de.intarsys.security.smartcard.pcsc

Interface IPCSCContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPCSCContextFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonPCSCContext, EmptyContext, MockPCSCContext, PCSCContext, PCSCMultiContext

    public interface IPCSCContext
extends IPCSCContextFactory
    The iconified PC/SC context. This is created by some IPCSCContextFactory, available at PCSCContextFactory.get()

    • Method Summary
